oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Retreat of the British from Pensacola
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print of the Battle of New Orleans - retreat of the British from Pensacola on the approach of Jackson. Soldiers running with bayonets in background. Two men on horseback in foreground.
Andrew Jackson captured the port of Pensacola on November 7, 1814 from the Spanish and their British allies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845
New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812;Louisiana--History--War of 1812
Campaigns & battles;Soldiers;Horses
